pr_title: Add analysis components and mapping types to the usage API.

timeline.message:
Add analysis components and mapping types to the usage API.

Knowing about used analysis components and mapping types would be incredibly
useful in order to know which ones may be deprecated or should get more love.

Some field types also act as a proxy to know about feature usage of some APIs
like the `percolator` or `completion` fields types for percolation and the
completion suggester, respectively.

timeline.bodyText: Should we also extract the analyzers set on the fields ? This could be useful to check the usage of the pre-built analyzers ?
timeline.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Should we also extract the pre-built tokenizer, filters and char_filters from custom analyzers ?
timeline.author: jimczi
